properties.headline: Flood Warning issued March 1 at 5:23PM CST until March 3 at 10:49PM CST by NWS Bismarck ND
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Bismarck ND has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in North Dakota...

Cannonball River at Breien affecting Morton and Sioux Counties.

.Warm temperatures have melted much of the remaining snow in the
area and the result has been an increase in river levels.

The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Cannonball River at Breien.
* Until Tuesday evening.
* At 4:15 PM CST Sunday / 3:15 PM MST Sunday the stage was 9.8 feet.
* Flood stage is 10.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this
evening to a crest of 11.2 feet late Monday afternoon. This should
be a short duration flood event with the river most likely falling
below flood stage Tuesday afternoon.
* Impact...At 9.0 feet, Water overflows north bank.
* Impact...At 12.0 feet, Water overflows south bank.
* Impact...At 13.0 feet, Southeast part of Breien subject to
flooding.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the
dangers of flooding.

Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
